Title: ASP.NET Community Standup - Blazing-fast AI chat with ASP.NET Core & SignalR
Author: dotnet
Description:
Join us to hear from guest Shaltiel Shmidman, Deep Learning Developer at DICTA, about his experience building a performant, real-time AI chat application from the ground up using C#, ASP.NET Core, and SignalR as part of the recent T3 Chat Cloneathon. Highlights include safe streaming, automatic connection resumption after refresh, and smooth synchronization across browser tabs. See how C# and ASP.NET Core provide a surprisingly straightforward path to robust real-time AI applications.
